title: Design Example Needed - School/Learning Related
content:
Hey everyone,

I’m looking for some great design examples (print or online) that would pertain to school, or just learning in general. However, it needs to learn towards the adult/professional end, and less towards younger children.

Anyone have some good examples?

Thanks,  
Mike

 [‹ Typeface for web and print](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008042859/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34284 "Go to previous forum topic") [Searching for zopa font. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008042859/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36550 "Go to next forum topic")
author: rosem

comments.content:
Hey Mike,

Check out [http://www.whipplehill.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081008042859/http:/www.whipplehill.com/), a company that does websites exclusively for education clients. My alma mater’s site was recently done by them, worth a look.

Paul

Thank you for the link.

Anyone know a good reference for some print work? I’d even buy a few books or two if needed.

Thanks again!
